name: Cressida - Art Doll
description:
*Click Images To Enlarge*

CONSTRUCTION
The dolls are made from paperclay and wear mohair wigs. Their eyes are glass that I crafted by hand; each one is different. They are jointed at the shoulders, elbows, hips and knees with Czech glass beads and jewelry wire. Their clothing is made from handmade paper and cannot be removed.

The dolls can sit propped up or stand with the help of a doll stand. They are for display purposes only, and are not intended for young children.

SIZE: 18" (47 cm) long

SHIPPING
-I ship airmail from Canada within 48 hours of receiving payment; please allow 5 - 12 business days for delivery, depending on your location.
-Shipping for this item includes insurance; please contact me if you would like to purchase tracking.

IMPORTANT NOTES
-Every aspect of my dolls is handmade; they are not meant to appear flawless or mass-produced. Their seams and hems are intentionally raw, the stitching is often visible and their surfaces have small irregularities; all of this adds to their unique, handmade aesthetic. Despite their antique look, the dolls are very carefully constructed; if well cared for, they should last generations. They are for display purposes only, and should be kept out of direct sunlight and moist conditions.

COPYRIGHT
I retain copyright of all items; copyright does not transfer to buyer upon sale.

name: Réjanne
description:
*Click Images To Enlarge*

CONSTRUCTION
Réjanne is made from paperclay and wears a hand-sewn mohair wig. Her eyes are glass that I crafted by hand; each one is different. She is jointed at the shoulders, elbows, hips and knees with Czech glass beads, silk ribbon ad jewelry wire.  Her clothing is made from silk organza. Her clothing is entirely hand-sewn and cannot be removed.

The dolls can sit propped up or stand with the help of a doll stand (sold separately - see the shop for listing). They are for display purposes only, and are not intended for young children.


SIZE: 16" (42 cm) long 

SHIPPING
-I ship airmail from Canada within 48 hours of receiving payment; please allow 5 - 12 business days for delivery, depending on your location.
-Shipping for this item includes insurance; please contact me if you would like to purchase tracking.  

IMPORTANT NOTES
-Every aspect of my dolls is handmade; they are not meant to appear flawless or mass-produced. Their seams and hems are intentionally raw, the stitching is often visible and their surfaces have small irregularities; all of this adds to their unique, handmade aesthetic. Despite their antique look, the dolls are very carefully constructed; if well cared for, they should last generations. They are for display purposes only, and should be kept out of direct sunlight and moist conditions.

COPYRIGHT
I retain copyright of all items; copyright does not transfer to buyer upon sale.
